name: Clone
description:
Note - Please play in full screen mode!

Clones is a Sci-fi platform game, which I created in order to test a hypothesis for my thesis. I was looking into whether a players level of immersion was affected by their game character's gender.  Also if anyone would like to obtain the sprite sheets for the characters they can be found on this wonderful website - http://gaurav.munjal.us/Universal-LPC-Spritesheet-...
